meanings.definition: A shrub with dark green leaves and clusters of white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The jetbead in the garden has beautiful white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted a jetbead shrub near the fence for decoration.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn stash under the jetbead.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a cluster of jetbead flowers in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the jetbead filled the air with a sweet scent.

meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Rhodotypos.
meanings.sent1: The jetbead is a lovely addition to the botanical garden.
meanings.sent2: Many birds enjoy perching on the branches of the jetbead.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to climb the jetbead tree but failed.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the garden like the rustling leaves of a jetbead.
meanings.sent5: The jetbead plant stood out among the other shrubs with its unique flowers.

meanings.sent1: The landscaper recommended planting a jetbead for its beauty.
meanings.sent2: The jetbead bush added a touch of elegance to the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel peeked out from behind the jetbead, looking for treats.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as dark and glossy as the leaves of a jetbead shrub.
meanings.sent5: The jetbead shrub became the focal point of the garden with its striking appearance.
